plot outline: A thief finds an innocent lady in the train who travels from her home town to city to meet her loved one. In the mean while the thief gets closer to the lady to rob her necklace. Later she gets betrayed by her loved one and she comes across the thief and explain her grief. Thief then turns into good human. They then collectively punch back her loved one. They both then falls in love at the end.
title: Dongaata
